articles.content: It's been 11 years since Casey Anthony was acquitted of murdering her daughter in a court case that garnered international attention reminiscent of the media frenzy that surrounded the O.J. Simpson t… [+5289 chars]

articles.title: Brendan Fraser speaks about his son Griffin, 20, having autism and obesity - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 53, shares three sons - Griffin, 20, Holand, 18, and Leland, 16 - with his ex-wife Afton Smith, who he divorced in 2007 after nine years of marriage.
articles.content:
Brendan Fraser has spoken about his eldest son Griffin, who is autistic and obese, and said he 'understands' what it is like to be close to someone who lives with obesity.
